alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 1:23PM AKST until December 21 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Elfin Cove and Pelican area, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, and Gustavus. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. Visibility will be reduced. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance of freezing rain at the beginning of the event Monday evening with potential for a light glaze. Greatest snowfall rates expected after midnight through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already occurring or imminent.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
